steps.name: Given I update user with ID "2" to name "John Updated" and job "Lead QA"
request ("{ method: 'PUT', url: '/api/users/id', headers: { 'x-api-key': undefined }, body: { name: 'John Updated', job: 'Lead QA' } }")
